name: Nikah Explorer
description: The OFFICIAL ANDROID App of NikahExplorer.com - #1 app for Muslims to complete half your deen in the light of the Quran and Sunnah. NikahExplorer is the best Muslim Matrimonial app out there. Download today for FREE and start looking for your Perfect Single Muslim Match.  Prophet Muhammad PBUH said: When a man marries, he has fulfilled half of his religion  If youre a single Muslim waiting to get married, well help you find your perfect Muslim match.  Download NikahExplorer App - Register in 60 seconds - Browse through 1000s of SingleMuslim Profiles - Get Connected to your perfect Muslim match  NikahExplorer.com has designed a Shariah Compliant Matrimonial Service for single Muslims that seeks to help them get married in a secure Islamic environment. We believe in making shaadi / nikah / marriage / shadi simple. So join NikahExplorer, just pick the Muslim profile that suits you and youre ready to start communication in a secure environment with privacyfor FREE  Why join NikahExplorer.com - We make it easier to get married - We offer 100% privacy of your information - We give you a modern, fresh and user-friendly interface & experience - A unique Shariah Compliant Matrimonial website - Simple, Secure and Effective Match-Making for Muslims - Helping Muslims complete half their deen
